attributes.action: Ban immigration from high risk countries in term of security and terrorism.
attributes.additional_details:
Please refer to all terrorist acts in Europe, the UK and the USA in the last 20 years committed by nationals of the countries in reference.
Also refer to the media and your intelligence services for the evidences on countries financing and supporting international terrorism.
attributes.background: Countries harbouring terrorist groups or/and financing/supporting terrorism are well identified: Afghanistan, Iran, Iraq, Syria, Libya, Sudan, Somalia, Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Algeria, Morocco, Nigeria.
